zkcdi 1.0RC API

Packages
org.zkoss.cdi.annotation.impl ZKCDI custom annotation implementation classes
org.zkoss.cdi.context ZKCDI custom context representing ZK scopes with CDI framework
org.zkoss.cdi.event ZKCDI custom qualifiers for events
org.zkoss.cdi.inject ZKCDI custom qualifiers for ZK component injection points
org.zkoss.cdi.util Utilities classes to support CDI features such as Injection and Event notification within ZK programming model
org.zkoss.cdi.weld JBoss Weld is the reference implementation for Contexts and Dependency Injection(JSR-299) used in Java EE 6.
org.zkoss.cdi.weld.context ZKCDI implemented custom contexts
org.zkoss.cdi.weld.spi ZKCDI portable extension class that pre-process ZK component injection points and register ZK custom contexts
